title: The Good, good, good, good life
creator_credit: Teleketics, Karl Holtsnider and Rolf Forsberg
brief_description: This film serves as a plea for restraint and conservation in the use of goods and services, through the story of a self-sufficient retired man whose modern family deluge him with modern appliances, re-do his homely living room and attempt to introduce him to the “good life”.
